EmailTemplate.name: Honda Layout - Pre-Approval Certificate - HFS - EN
EmailTemplate.subject: PRIVATE AND CONFIDENTIAL - Pre-Approved Certificate
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
PRIVATE AND CONFIDENTIAL - Pre-Approved Certificate
Good morning/afternoon/evening,
It was a pleasure speaking with you earlier. As promised please find attached your pre-approval certificate.
Please note I will be forwarding this to xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx Honda and a rep will be contacting you in the near future to schedule an appointment with you.
If you have further questions please do not hesitate to contact us below.
Thank you for your business with us and have a wonderful day!
Best regards,
Renewal & Maturity Centre Honda Financial Services T: 1-800-387-5399 x7528 | F: 1-888-254-8875 Monday - Friday 8am-8pm EST crc@ch.honda.com
Please visit our owners' website at www.myhonda.ca or www.myacura.ca, click on “MyFinance” to register and access your account online. __________________________
This transmission (including attachments, if any) is confidential and may be privileged. It is intended only for the person(s) named above. Any other distribution, copying or disclosure whatsoever is STRICTLY PROHIBITED. If you have received this e-mail in error, please delete it and any attachments from your computer system and records.
Ce message (et les pièces qui y sont jointes, le cas échéant) est confidentiel et peut contenir des renseignements privilégiés. Il est destiné à l'intention exclusive de la (des) personne(s) nommée(s) ci-dessus. Toute autre distribution, copie ou divulgation quelconque est STRICTEMENT INTERDITE. Si vous avez reçu ce message par erreur, veuillez éliminer ce message, ainsi que les pièces jointes, de votre système informatique et de vos dossiers.
************************************************************************
Privacy Policy | Terms & Conditions | Contact Us
This is a system email account, and unfortunately, replies to this email cannot be acknowledged. If you have any questions or comments please follow this Contact Us link: http://www.honda.ca/contact_us
At Honda, we hold your personal information in strictest confidence, in accordance with federal and provincial guidelines. For further details on Honda's Customer Privacy Policy, please visit our Privacy Policy (http://www.honda.ca/privacy).
© {!YEAR(TODAY())} Honda Canada. 180 Honda Boulevard, Markham, ON, L6C 0H9, 1-888-946-6329
All information contained herein applies to Canadian products only.
